testcase.name: verify user can donate £20 single donation
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to https://alzheimers-donations.wpnc-uat.site/..........passed And user click donate twenty pound..........................................passed And user click donation amount continue tab.................................passed And user click credit/debit card payment type...............................passed And user enters "4000000000001000"..........................................passed And user fill my detail page................................................passed And user fill my address page...............................................passed And user click Is this address also your billing address checkbox...........passed When user click single donation confirm page complete donation tab..........passed Then Thank you for your donation page should be displayed...................passed
